Literature.Title: Inhibitory effect of short cationic homopeptides against Gram-positive bacteria
Literature.Author: Guzmán F, Marshall S, Ojeda C, Albericio F, Carvajal-Rondanelli P

Literature.Title: Inhibitory effect of short cationic homopeptides against Gram-negative bacteria
Literature.Author: Carvajal-Rondanelli P, Aróstica M, Marshall SH, Albericio F, Álvarez CA, Ojeda C, Aguilar LF, Guzmán F

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(0-10% Inhibition=10µM),Listeria monocytogenes ATCC 19115(30-40% Inhibition=10-20µM),Micrococcus luteus ATCC 9341(40-50% Inhibition=10µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(20-30% Inhibition=20µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(90-100% Inhibition=30µM),Bacillus cereus ATCC 10876(40-50% Inhibition=10µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(10-20% Inhibition=10µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(20-30% Inhibition=20µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(0-10% Inhibition=10µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(0-10% Inhibition=20µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(90-100% Inhibition=30µM),Vibrio parahaemolyticus ISP 72-01(10-20% Inhibition=10µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(20-30% Inhibition=10-20µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(90-100% Inhibition=30µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Enteritidis ISP 1833-99(10-20% Inhibition=10µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Enteritidis ISP 1833-99(10-20% Inhibition=20µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Enteritidis ISP 1833-99(90-100% Inhibition=30µM),Aeromonas hydrophila ATCC 7966(0-10% Inhibition=10µM),Aeromonas hydrophila ATCC 7966(20-30% Inhibition=20µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(0-10% Inhibition=10µM)
